attributes.action: Celebrate Team GB and London 2012 success with a bank holiday
attributes.additional_details:
Let's have a public bank holiday on 9th September to celebrate the best Olympic's ever and our successful hosting of the games and the way it has made us all proud to be British and brought the country together.

We should also celebrate Team GB's  best ever performance in modern era at London 2012

With the Paralympics still to come and Team GB due to be a the top end of the medal table this will be a fitting way to bring the UK together and allow people to join the Team GB parade in London.
